basic.description: This course discusses elementary theories of individual and group decision-making which are used to analyze various political phenomena such as the arms race, legislative politics, majority rule in democracies, voting and elections, and coalition governments.
basic.subject: POS
basic.title: Politics and the Theory of Games

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: CPO 2002 or INR 2002 or POS 1041 and completion of the mathematics liberal studies requirement.
